review: I am unable to get the Fire Stick to work at all.Also, the product went on sale ten dollars less than I paid for it a few days later.  Either way it does not work at all and I cannot locate the remote control that was supposed to be in the box.
author: Randi Feldman

review: Works great, just disappointed in the amount of content with the prime membership. I had to pay for Jurassic park. That's a really old movie.
author: Page Turner

review: Thought i could stream from my phone to the tv. Anything that i was,playibg on my phone

review: It is worth the $$ especially if you are a Prime member.
author: Cary Owens

review: I love the fire stick. Everything I expected it to  be and more!
author: Jessica L. Griffin

review: just what I needed and works great. easy to install.
author: Stephen Jacobson

review: Great device for a great price. The only drawback I saw is that it has to be plugged into an outlet. I thought that it would just plug into the HDMI plug in on the back of the tv with no wires showing.
author: Deanna Mason
